title: godoc: missing handler for /ref, /project, and /help
body:
When you run godoc -http=:8080 locally, the buttons on the top of page doesn't
point to valid pages.

Also, the godoc serving tip.golang.org is out-of-date,
http://tip.golang.org/doc/effective_go.html#interfaces_and_types
Shows "{{code "/doc/progs/eff_sequence.go" `/^type/`
"$"}}" in it.
